title: Suzipie's korma storma
ingredients: ['oil to saute', '1 to 2 onions, diced', '3 heaped teaspoons of garam masala', '3 to 5 chicken breasts, cut into bite sized chunks', '100g (1/2 pack) creamed coconut', 'approx 300ml (1/2 pint) boiling water', '1 tablespoon of chicken gravy granules (or chicken stock cube)']
